In.Name: Show
In.Description: Shows the debug text on the viewport

In.Name: Hide
In.Description: Removed the debug text from the viewport

Property.Name: Text
Property.Description: The text to display on screen.

Property.Name: Position
Property.Description: Position of the text on-screen in normalized coordinates [0-1].

Property.Name: Duration
Property.Description: If greater than zero, the text will disappear after this duration (in seconds).

Property.Name: Scale
Property.Description: Scales the font size of the text.

Property.Name: Centered
Property.Description: Centers the text around the specfied coordinates.

Property.Name: Editor Only
Property.Description: Only displays this text if the game is being run in-editor, not on launchers.
